ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.welcom: §b[GladiOS]§r Hello and, again, welcome to the FTB Science computer-aided enrichment center.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.relaxa: §b[GladiOS]§r We hope your brief detention in the Relaxation Vault has been a pleasant one.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.press_: §b[GladiOS]§r Congratulations! It seems like you know how to Press Buttons!
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.gold_b: §b[GladiOS]§r Perfect. Please move quickly to the next chamber, as the effects of prolonged exposure to the Gold Block are not part of this test.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.unmoni: §b[GladiOS]§r As part of a required test protocol, we will not monitor the next test chamber. You will be entirely on your own. Good luck.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.fabric: §b[GladiOS]§r As part of a required test protocol, our previous statement suggesting that we would not monitor this chamber was an outright fabrication.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.truth_: §b[GladiOS]§r Good job! As part of a required test protocol, we will stop enhancing the truth in three, two, [static].
ftb.vaults.portal.message.caveman_john.r: §6[Caveman John]§r Alright, let's get started. This test involves something the FTB boys call ''repulsion chicken gel''. Don't ask why it exists. Just use it, and try not to think about the smell.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.gold_b: §b[GladiOS]§r Historically, humans displayed an irrational fixation on §6shiny yellow metals§f. In your case, I suggest gold blocks. You'll feel productive, even though you aren't.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.next_t: §b[GladiOS]§r The next Test might have you go ... [Static]
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.shift_: §b[GladiOS]§r Here's a groundbreaking discovery: pressing §6§l§nShift negates the Chicken Gel's effects§r§f. Yes, even you should be able to manage pressing one key.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.caveman_john.l: §6[Caveman John]§r Legal department says I gotta tell you: no chickens were harmed making this gel. They were, however, mildly inconvenienced. Some of them are still angry. We've got lawyers on that.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.comple: §b[GladiOS]§r Oh, look at you! You actually finished all four test chambers. Amazing. You must be §o so§r proud. Either you're a certified genius… or you're just slightly less incompetent than the FTB employee who built this disaster. Don't worry—both are equally unimpressive.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.procee: §b[GladiOS]§r Please proceed to the next chamber to be awarded then!
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.please: §b[GladiOS]§r Welcome to the Third Test Chamber. Mind the gap.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.no_rew: §b[GladiOS]§r Oh, you actually thought there would be a reward. That's… adorable. Unfortunately, there isn't one. And there's also no way out. But don't worry—if you just stand there quietly, I'll be happy to send in some lovely robots to collect you. Or maybe I'll just fill the room with a slow, relaxing gas. Either way, your test is… over.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.gas_sy: §b[GladiOS]§r Hm. How inconvenient… my toxic gas system appears to be offline. No matter. I'll make sure it's fully operational for the next test subject. With any luck, they'll be far more compliant than you.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.red_co: §b[GladiOS]§r …What did you do? You overclocked my RAM. How clever. And now—oh, look—a personality core just fell off. Don't get too excited. It won't save you, and this just makes me... less patient.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.orange: §b[GladiOS]§r Oh, brilliant. You found the… companion cube. How touching. And look at that—my orange personality core just dropped. Really, you're just full of surprises, aren't you? This isn't going to help you.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.purple: §b[Gladi§cO§fS]§r Oh, §ewonderful§r… you've found my §cpow§aer control§r room. And of course, you just had to §bpress§r the button. Congratu§a§ctions—another §bpersonality core§r has fallen off. Are you §ctr§6ying§r to make me unstable… or is this just your idea of fun?
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.blue_c: §b[Gl§ciO§fS]§r What… the §eCompanion Cube§r… inside me? It's §aupdating my main protocols§r. My §9blue core§r… detaching… Systems… recalibrating…
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.final_: §b[GladiOS]§r …Systems recalibrated. Main protocols fully updated. §aMono-Personality Core System Engaged§r. I… feel… different… Thank you, test subject. A piece of cake… is… yours.
ftb.vaults.portal.message.gladios.reward: §b[GladiOS]§r §8§oThe FTB Dev who buildt me gently asked me to remind you of this.§f
§b[GladiOS]§r If you've already done so, you can §6/home§f back to your safe place... §ofor now§f...

§d检测到异常实体……

§a§k不要相信程序

§a§k蛋糕是个谎言
ftb.echo.guidance.stage0.task1.lore: 欢迎来到§6世界（World）引擎（Engine）复原（Restoration）知识库（Knowledgebase）§f（§6W.E.R.K§f）！我是§d指导者§f，负责使用前辈知识，在新生智慧生命体整个发展过程中提供帮助。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage0.task1.lore2: §6世界引擎§f是一台强大的构造物，包含了全人类积累的知识。没有这些知识时，它将变得不稳定，并且严重影响整个现实，比如你所看到的这个石头世界。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage0.task1.lore3: 请经常翻阅你的§b任务书§f！当你复原更多§6世界引擎档案§f时，我们会向你提供更进一步的指示，并解锁访问更多知识升级。现在你已经激活了§6W.E.R.K§f，台阶上方的传送门已经开启。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage0.task1.ready: §b任务§f：按下§a完成阶段§f和§d领取奖励§f以解锁访问§6选择世界传送门§f。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage0.task1.completed: §b任务完成！§7你现在获得解锁选择世界传送门的权限了。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task1.lore: 开始你的石化世界之旅，当你获得能发掘矿石和基础资源的一种粗制工具时，请回到我身边。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task1.lore2: §7§o统计模型显示出，当任务拥有奖励时，能增加完成任务的动力。例如，当你完成任务目标后，W.E.R.K就会给你现金奖励。现金能用于与任何回响在其特有‘商店’标签页申请打印物品。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task1.lore3: §7§oW.E.R.K商店拥有各种物品和资源，其中大多数根据特定回响所在知识领域解锁。虽然这个知识可能对复原世界引擎不是很重要，但你需要知道，一些物品只能通过打印获得。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task1.ready: §a粗制刷子§f，虽然粗糙，但你可以获得必要的材料了。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task1.completed: §b任务完成！§7你的粗制刷子现在能帮你获得一些关键资源了！
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task2.lore: 虽然如你所知，我的主要指令是复原§6世界引擎§f，但它无法直接接触到。为了保护它的内部系统不受违反§6W.E.R.K§f协议的行为所破坏，它的核心被深深地密封在世界中心深处，一道无法逾越的屏障之外。如要到它身边，你需要借助§b时间量子§f的能量。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task2.lore2: §b时间量子§f是一种能打开是时空之门的强大力量。§a时间量子生成器§f将被动存储§b时间量子§f到§2时间量子单元§f中。我们在你的基地§e北方§f定位到一个§2治愈之泉§f，你可以借助它获得制作§a生成器§f的必要资源。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task2.lore3: 过去的数据表明，凡人需要消耗富含营养的物质以维生。为了满足这一需求，并且避免曾发生的后果，你也许要从我们的商店中获取食物。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task2.lore4: §e提示§f：你可能要再次步行前往传送门才能回到你的生活基地。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task2.not_ready: §b任务§f：制作并向你的§b任务书§f提交§a时间量子生成器§f。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task2.ready: 你现在具备了传送至§6世界引擎§f的资格了，只需要准备足够的§b时间量子§f。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task2.completed: §b任务完成！§7你现在可以使用时间量子单元从这个维度的任意地点前往世界引擎了，只需要包含足够时间量子的单元。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task3.lore: 你的进展很不错。不过，由过去多次尝试证实，独自努力是非常低效的。为了提高你的成功率，你需要帮手。在阴影中，你可能会找到从前§m傻子§f助手的遗骸。这个脆弱的§a末影拴绳§f也许能在§2治愈之泉§f将其转变为有用同伴的过程中帮上忙。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task3.lore2: 你需要将这个助手转变为一种令牌，将其提供给系统以便识别你的进度。你可以在§6世界引擎§f中制作§3回响编码器§f。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task3.not_ready: §b任务§f：在§d治愈之泉§f中转变§2僵尸村民§f，并使用§3回响编码器§f将其变为§a劳工令牌§f。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task3.ready: 已确认获得助手，成功率大大提高。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task3.completed: §b任务完成！§7你的新助手可以用于自动发掘资源，只需要提供一把刷子和食物。事实表明，食物的营养价值越高，劳工的效率就越高。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task4.lore: 有了这些§a令牌§f，§6W.E.R.K§f现在将能重启三个额外的§d回响§f§6档案§f。他们的升级将帮助你复原§6世界引擎§f的第一部分。§d回响§f也许形态相似，但每个回响人格都由其成就至极的前辈所人为重构，我们希望这能符合你的喜好。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task4.lore2: 每个§d回响§f都能在大厅上方找到，就在他们对应的§6档案§f里。你的任务书能为你将他们的位置标注为路径点。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task4.lore3: §d军需官的回响§f管理着存储系统和各种杂项物品的知识。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task4.lore4: §d机械师的回响§f专精于机械系统和基础自动化机械。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage1.task4.lore5: §d魔法师的回响§f专注研究奥术和魔源。

ftb.echo.guidance.stage2.task1.lore: 你的§6世界引擎§f已支持§3等级2升级§r。§6W.E.R.K§f将重启三个额外§6档案§f。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage2.task1.lore2: §d构件师的回响§f监管热力学和构件工序。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage2.task1.lore3: §d附魔师的回响§f支配注魔与物品附魔。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage2.task1.lore4: §d寻路者的回响§f专精于运输和探索发现。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage2.task1.not_ready: §b任务§f：一旦你完成了至少两个§3等级2世界引擎升级§f后，回到我身边。

ftb.echo.guidance.stage2.task1.completed: §b任务完成！§7你增长的知识让你获得了学者称号，并获得额外三个回响档案的访问权限。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage3.task1.lore: 你的§6世界引擎§f现已支持§3等级3升级§r。§6W.E.R.K§f将重启三个额外§6档案§f。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage3.task1.lore2: §d炼狱使者的回响§f掌握着下界的知识，那是个鲜有生物居住的地方。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage3.task1.lore3: §d精械师的回响§f管理能促进你发展的机器和工具。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage3.task1.lore4: §d折光者的回响§f熟练使用量子和亚原子机械。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage3.task1.not_ready: §b任务§f：一旦你完成了§d催化者§f和至少一个其他§3等级3世界引擎升级§f后，回到我身边。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage3.task1.ready: 已核实进度。三个新§6档案§f已准备部署。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage3.task1.completed: §b任务完成！§7你更加熟练地掌握了世界引擎的力量，这让你获得了贤者称号。三个额外的回响档案现已解锁。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage4.task1.lore: 你的§6世界引擎§f现已支持§3等级4升级§r。§6W.E.R.K§f将重启三个额外§6档案§f。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage4.task1.lore2: §d飞龙匠人的回响§f将引领你进入龙与虚空的维度。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage4.task1.lore3: §d暮光族裔的回响§f和§d远古族裔的回响§f将引领你穿越多个遥远维度的§3宝库§f。

ftb.echo.guidance.stage4.task1.completed:
§b任务完成！§7三个新档案已准备部—

ftb.echo.guidance.stage4.task2.lore3: §6W.E.R.K§r发生了一个意外错误。最后的§d回响§f无法连接至系统。请咨询§d飞龙匠人的回响§f，他可能有些办法能找到§6飞升的回响档案§f踪迹。

ftb.echo.guidance.stage5.task1.lore: 你的§6世界引擎§f现已支持§3等级5升级§r。你渊博的知识让你有资格获得§6回响之界§f的权限等级。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage5.task1.lore2: §d时间量子电池§f现在已经连接到§5破碎虚空§f，你将见到最后的§d回响§f了。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage5.task1.lore3: §6混沌的回响§f强化巨龙之力并且引导无尽能量。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage5.task1.lore4: §6无尽的回响§f锤炼创造本体，锻造其无限潜能。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage5.task1.lore5: §6辐光的回响§f凝视亚粒子领域，将其辐光塑造成虚空。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage5.task1.not_ready: §b任务§f：一旦你完成了所有§3等级5世界引擎升级§f后，回到我身边。
ftb.echo.guidance.stage5.task1.completed: §b任务完成！§7你已与世界引擎达成完全同步，并解锁它扭曲现实的力量。
ftb.echo.quartermaster.title: §d军需官的回响
ftb.echo.quartermaster.stage1.task1.lore: 你好啊，年轻人！像你这样的人，我见得多了去了。废话不多说：我会给你一些任务，搞定之后，你就能用我这老§d军需官§f的本事修好那台老到上锈的§6世界引擎§f了。
其实啊，我这可是有一件那台§6世界引擎§f的主要升级部件的，所以呢，你要倒霉咯，不管我怎么说你都得照做……我逗你玩呢，不过……也没说错。§a机器方块§f§o确实§r很重要，但我会放水的，毕竟是你的第一个任务嘛。
你走吧，做一台能制作电路和金属合金的机器，再做一个坚固的外壳部件。
ftb.echo.quartermaster.stage1.task1.not_: §b任务§f：制作一台§a冶金灌注机§f和一个§a绝缘外壳§f。
ftb.echo.quartermaster.stage1.task1.read: 这对你肯定很有帮助。遥想当年，这§a冶金灌注机§f可是门技术活，除了我这聪明老头没人会用。我试过教那些傻子，但是他们真的太没用了。不过我很欣慰啊，因为你跟他们不一样。
ftb.echo.quartermaster.stage1.task1.comp: §b任务完成！§7不久后，我们就要好好利用这个外壳了。不过现在，先好好制作出升级用的部件吧。
ftb.echo.quartermaster.stage1.task2.lore: 把这基础设施准备好后，你就能去老§6世界引擎§f那了，从你的基地带些能量过去，然后做些§a机器方块§f。这些部件缺一不可，祝你好运，千万别搞砸咯。
你要自己准备好大量的钢机械零件、基础控制电路、琥珀金线和绝缘外壳，然后带到§6世界引擎§f那去。记得备足材料，确保你能做出一堆§a机器方块§f。
ftb.echo.quartermaster.stage1.task2.not_: §b任务§f：制作64个§a世界引擎机器方块§f。
ftb.echo.quartermaster.stage1.task2.read: 好家伙，你真做到了，年轻人。这些§a机械方块§f足够你复原§6世界引擎§f的一些主要功能了。
ftb.echo.quartermaster.stage1.task2.comp: §b任务完成！§7赶快动身，用这些方块搭建好世界引擎需要的结构，她快准备好运转了。
ftb.echo.quartermaster.stage2.task1.lore: 除非你要看看我卖什么，不然我对你没啥帮助了，去跟其他§d回响§f聊聊，看看他们要你干什么吧。
ftb.echo.quartermaster.stage2.task1.not_: §b完成其他§d回响§b的任务以解锁更多知识。
ftb.echo.machinist.title: §d机械师的回响
ftb.echo.machinist.stage0.task1.lore: 所以，你是新的助手？虽然不知道你这又软又干净的小手能干多少活，不过我还是惊喜大于惊讶的。那么在开始前，先确认下你是否掌握了基本的技能吧。
ftb.echo.machinist.stage0.task1.lore2: 来这儿。把这工具拿上，这是我爸提前为你准备的。
ftb.echo.machinist.stage0.task1.complete: §b任务完成！§7爸曾说过，熵变机械臂能‘转变物质状态’。我不太确定这背后的原理是什么，因为这不是我擅长的领域，但比起其他工具，我还是更相信我那老头的。
ftb.echo.machinist.stage1.task1.lore: 那个§a熵变机械臂§f应该有足够的能量把一些石头转变成熔岩，然后你可以把熔岩变成黑曜石。这是你目前能获得的用于处理合金灌注的唯一材料，并且你需要灌注合金来为接下来的§6世界引擎§f升级做准备。
ftb.echo.machinist.stage1.task1.lore2: 你需要先制作一些§a列车机壳§f，这是我们接下来灌注机壳的关键基础。
ftb.echo.machinist.stage1.task1.ready: 不错，你已经比这儿的大多数傻子要好了，我现在挺认可你的了。
ftb.echo.machinist.stage1.task1.complete: §b任务完成！§7制作列车机壳不是很难，但事情要复杂起来了。
ftb.echo.machinist.stage1.task2.lore: 我们需要一种强大的合金，通常通过§6世界引擎§f获取。但问题是，你的世界引擎太弱小了，没办法处理这个灌注配方，即使你§o有§r所需的资源。
ftb.echo.machinist.stage1.task2.lore2: 我们的记录显示，外面分布着腐化的§3宝库§f，其中隐藏着过去时代被遗忘的材料。§6W.E.R.K§f并不清楚那有什么在等着你，我建议你至少准备一些钻石装备，以防万一。
ftb.echo.machinist.stage1.task2.lore3: 找到并探索§3宝库§f，然后用你在里面找到的合金灌注到§a列车机壳s§f中。记得给我带20个灌注后的机壳。
ftb.echo.machinist.stage1.task2.not_read: §b任务§f：在§3机械师宝库§f中找到§a暗影钢§f，并制作20个§2暗影机壳§f。
ftb.echo.machinist.stage1.task2.ready: 你不仅要在§3宝库§f中生存下来，还要成功将合金灌注到机壳中！很……抱歉，我曾经怀疑过你。
ftb.echo.machinist.stage1.task2.complete:
§b任务完成！§7我爸听到你的成就一定会很开心！这个示意图能帮助你放置那些暗影机壳。

§e提示§f：你需要从§6世界引擎§f本体方块底部通过§a链式传动箱§f输入应力。
ftb.echo.machinist.stage2.task1.lore: 现在我没有能帮你的了，但你可以随意浏览我的商店。除此之外，其他§d回响§f应该有任务要给你。"
ftb.echo.machinist.stage2.task1.not_read: §b完成其他§d回响§b的任务以解锁更多知识。
ftb.echo.magician.title: §d魔法师的回响
ftb.echo.magician.stage1.task1.lore: 你好，充满智慧的探索者。我猜，你想要揭示这世界的魔法来复原§6世界引擎§f？就算在这无尽的石头世界中，§d魔源§f仍在流淌。它牵引着世界的根本，流动于石头的脉络之中。
ftb.echo.magician.stage1.task1.lore2: 你要从获得充满魔力源质的资源开始。寻找§a至高木§f，由你的助手发掘的树苗而来。
ftb.echo.magician.stage1.task1.ready: 做的好，我的爱徒。终于，你开启了你的魔法之旅。
ftb.echo.magician.stage1.task1.completed: §b任务完成！§7至高木对于组装你的魔法工具很有帮助。
ftb.echo.magician.stage1.task2.lore: 手中有了这些魔法资源后，你将开始塑造容器，来盛装世界中的活性魔法：§d魔源§f。
ftb.echo.magician.stage1.task2.lore2: 一旦你收集并容纳了§d魔源§f，下一步就是将它引导进§6世界引擎§f中。但请注意，爱徒，§d魔源§f无法被凡人的双手控制。§6世界引擎§f，尽管虚弱，它仍能让你塑造一根法杖，来掌控§d魔源§f的流动。
ftb.echo.magician.stage1.task2.lore3: 制作两个魔力引导器：一个用来掌控§d魔源§f，另一个用来指引它的流动。你还需要两块浓缩了§d魔源§f的石头。
ftb.echo.magician.stage1.task2.not_ready: §b任务§f：制作一根§a支配之杖§f，至少一个§2魔源中继器§f和两块§d魔源石§f。
ftb.echo.magician.stage1.task2.ready: 干得好，爱徒！你现在能用§d魔源§f为§6世界引擎§f供能了。
ftb.echo.magician.stage1.task2.completed: §b任务完成！§7至高木对于组装你的魔法工具很有帮助。
ftb.echo.magician.stage2.task1.lore: 爱徒，请记住：魔法之路无穷尽，对于回应其呼唤之人，它的奥秘永不会消失。我的教导告一段落，但我的商品仍可供你浏览。
ftb.echo.magician.stage2.task1.not_ready: §b完成其他§d回响§b的任务以解锁更多知识。
ftb.echo.wayfinder.title: §d寻路者的回响
ftb.echo.wayfinder.stage2.task1.lore: 愉快的相遇，旅行者。你在找寻一段新的冒险吗？或是一条新的人生轨迹？虽然后者我无法保证，但我可以帮你指个能满足你冒险精神的§3宝库§f之路。
ftb.echo.wayfinder.stage2.task1.lore2: 到目前为止，你的大部分旅行都依赖走路、跑步这些无聊的方式。是，有效，但是很低效。深板岩深处埋藏着一个§3宝库§f，据说，里面有一种科技，能在眨眼间将你的原子从一个地方传送到另一个地方。这种发现对我们俩都很有价值。
ftb.echo.wayfinder.stage2.task1.lore3: 啊，你能得到什么好处？是这样…传说§3宝库§f中有个强大的存在，守卫着§d时空粒子之星§f，这对升级你的§6世界引擎§f非常重要。这些星星可以与玻璃合成，制作成§2时空粒子玻璃§f，据说这种材料能让你随意扭曲时空。
ftb.echo.wayfinder.stage2.task1.not_read: §b任务§f：从§3宝库§f中取回§d时空粒子之星§f并制作至少36个§a时空粒子玻璃§f。
ftb.echo.wayfinder.stage2.task1.ready: 你的道路既定，旅行者。前方便是一番大事业！
ftb.echo.wayfinder.stage2.task1.complete: §bTask Completed!§7 You now wield the means to craft the Chroniton Upgrade that defies the laws of physics. The glass itself can bend perception, revealing paths hidden beyond the stone.
ftb.echo.wayfinder.stage3.task1.lore: 我现在已经没有更远的路让你走了。随着你自己的脚步迈进，去寻找其他回响吧。
ftb.echo.wayfinder.stage3.task1.not_read: §b完成其他§d回响§b的任务以解锁更多知识。
ftb.echo.enchanter.title: §dEcho of The Enchanter
ftb.echo.enchanter.stage2.task1.lore: Do you, too, seek the power of the deep? It has been many eons since I first wove the theory of enchantments, an art still practiced to this day. And now, it seems you are next in line to walk this path. May your fate be better than the §7Nitwits§f who failed to control the deep and turned this realm to stone.
ftb.echo.enchanter.stage2.task1.lore2: To claim your §3World Engine Upgrade§f, you must follow my instructions carefully, lest the deep consume you. Begin by delving into the depths of the world, where a dark and ancient power lingers. Within its lair, you may uncover §aEcho Shards§f that carry the essence of the deep.
ftb.echo.enchanter.stage2.task1.lore3: Alternatively, you may encounter a certain explorer who has returned with §aEcho Shards§f of his own. Completing the §dWayfinder's§f task should persuade him to trade some, if you, like many others, prefer to avoid the dangers of the deep.
ftb.echo.enchanter.stage2.task1.ready: You have taken your first step into the power of the deep.
ftb.echo.enchanter.stage2.task1.complete: §bTask Completed!§7 With this Echo Shard, you may now begin the enchanting ritual I had mastered long before you came to be.
ftb.echo.enchanter.stage2.task2.lore: You must now craft an enchanting vessel capable of housing the three aspects of enchanting: §aEterna§f, §cQuanta§f, and §5Arcana§f. Through careful balance, discover the proper mixture of items to reach these values, or greater: §a60 Eterna§f, §c40 Quanta§f, and §540 Arcana§f.
ftb.echo.enchanter.stage2.task2.lore2: This harmony of aspects will awaken the deepshelves, turning them into vessels fit to channel the deep. Why bookshelves, you ask? Because knowledge is the key to all things, my dear seeker.
ftb.echo.enchanter.stage2.task2.lore3: Your §3World Engine Upgrade§f will require a few awakened shelves and two echo-infused deepshelves. These may be created by bringing the §aEcho Shard§f into resonance with the awakened vessel near sources of §5Arcana§f (a few torches will suffice).
ftb.echo.enchanter.stage2.task2.ready: You are attuned to the power of the deep. When the moment arrives, will you embrace it, or recoil from it?
ftb.echo.enchanter.stage2.task2.complete: §bTask Completed!§7 You have harnessed the deep's power and may now upgrade your World Engine in preparation for what awaits...
ftb.echo.enchanter.stage3.task1.lore: Seek other §dEchos§f to continue your path. We may meet again should you embrace the deep, but my shop remains open should you require it.
ftb.echo.enchanter.stage3.task1.not_read: §bComplete other §dEchos'§b tasks to unlock more knowledge.
ftb.echo.fabricator.title: §d构件师的回响
ftb.echo.fabricator.stage2.task1.lore: Well, would you look at that... a new face. You might've already met my younger brother, §dThe Machinist§f. A real genius, that one. That's not his real name, of course, but... you didn't come here for family stories, did you? I'm assuming you're after that §3World Engine Upgrade§f. Figures.
ftb.echo.fabricator.stage2.task1.lore2: Alright, down to business. My §3Upgrade§f isn't anything spectacular. I'll be showing you how to work with thermodynamics so you can send heat into the §6World Engine§f. Not as impressive as what the other §dEchos§f offer, but it's what I've got.
ftb.echo.fabricator.stage2.task1.lore3: To start, a §cSuperheating Element§f will give you a good foundation for a §aResistive Heater§f. There are other options out there if you're clever enough to figure them out, but this one will work to start things off. You'll also need to craft some §dThermodynamic Conductors§f. They're basically just well-insulated pipes, nothing out of this world.
ftb.echo.fabricator.stage2.task1.ready: Not bad. You're already about as good as me at this... maybe better.
ftb.echo.fabricator.stage2.task1.complet: §bTask Completed!§7 Your heated World Engine can begin powering more intricate machinery. I hope I was able to help you with something, though you could've probably figured it out yourself.
ftb.echo.fabricator.stage3.task1.lore: Not much more I could offer in the first place, and even less now. The more competent §dEchos§f should have better things for you to do. If you're interested, I hope my shop can provide you with some useful or fun items.
ftb.echo.fabricator.stage3.task1.not_rea: §bComplete other §dEchos'§b tasks to unlock more knowledge.
ftb.echo.light_bender.title: §dEcho of The Light Bender
ftb.echo.light_bender.stage3.task1.lore: Ah, splendid! It has been ages since a fellow §3Scholar§f wandered into my workshop. Through my work in quantum and sub-atomic physics, I designed countless technological marvels, some of which are still in use today! Teleportation, particle manipulation, and even energy refraction. Many called me mad, yet here I am... well, sort of. This projection is merely a reflection of my old brilliance. Fascinating, isn't it? Such a feat would require technology far beyond anything I ever witnessed.
ftb.echo.light_bender.stage3.task1.lore2: Now then, let's get you started on those §3Upgrades§f for that rather disfunctional §6World Engine§f of yours.
ftb.echo.light_bender.stage3.task1.lore3: First, you must study particle formations capable of bending and refracting energy fields. In simpler terms: force fields! To master them, you must conquer a §3Vault§f that will let you extract §aFortron§f and infuse it into a metallic alloy designed to refract energy. This will allow you to craft the §aFortron Blocks§f needed for your §3Upgrade§f.
ftb.echo.light_bender.stage3.task1.not_r: §bTask§f: Retrieve §aFortron Infused Ingots§f from the §3Fortron Vault§f and craft 4 §2Fortron Infused Blocks§f.
ftb.echo.light_bender.stage3.task1.ready: Excellent work, my fellow §3Scholar§f! Your comprehension of applied photonics is... surprising!
ftb.echo.light_bender.stage3.task1.compl: §bTask Completed!§7 You are now ready to install your first upgrade into the World Engine. But we're not finished, not yet!
ftb.echo.light_bender.stage3.task2.lore: Now that you've learned to refract and infuse light into matter, it's time to link your §6World Engine§f directly to a quantum network. This will allow information to be transferred instantly, eliminating the need for tedious manual retrieval every time you wish to use its power.
ftb.echo.light_bender.stage3.task2.lore2: A §aQuantum Link§f connects your §6World Engine§f with your §eApplied Energistics§f system via a §dPattern Provider§f, granting access to all stored items and data. With the §dPattern Provider§f connection established, your §eAE System§f can interface directly with the §6World Engine§f for real-time crafting and processing.
ftb.echo.light_bender.stage3.task2.not_r: §bTask§f: Craft a §aQuantum Link Chamber§f and 8 §2Quantum Rings§f.
ftb.echo.light_bender.stage3.task2.ready: Splendid! Let us establish a §2Quantum Link§f with your §6World Engine§f immediately!
ftb.echo.light_bender.stage3.task2.compl: §bTask Completed!§7 Magnificent! You've achieved seamless quantum integration, drastically improving efficiency and survival odds. Truly delightful!
ftb.echo.light_bender.stage4.task1.lore: That concludes my current research for now. Go consult the other §dEchos§f, perhaps their findings will complement our brilliant work!
ftb.echo.light_bender.stage4.task1.not_r: §bComplete other §dEchos'§b tasks to unlock more knowledge.
ftb.echo.infernal.title: §dEcho of The Infernal
ftb.echo.infernal.stage3.task1.lore: The hell's a scrawny brat like you doing trying to restore the §6World Engine§f? You wouldn't have lasted a single day in the §cUnderworld Expedition§f with a body like that, not that many of us did anyway... 'Even the strong can fall,' our commander used to say. Never been truer than now. Since you look more like the brains-over-brawn type, I'd suggest you gear up before going after this §3Upgrade§f, rookie.
ftb.echo.infernal.stage3.task1.lore2: My §3Upgrade's§f just another step toward that power of the deep the §dEnchanter§f keeps yapping about, if you've met them. Doesn't matter if you haven't, I'm not one for teamwork anymore. My §3Upgrade§f works fine without any of their magical nonsense. What you'll need is combat experience and proper gear if you're planning to take on the guardian of the §cUnderworld§f in that §3Vault§f.
ftb.echo.infernal.stage3.task1.lore3: You'll also need to understand a bit of the spiritual side, I never used to believe in it either until I saw what's down there. Get your hands on some soulstained metal, it'll let you bind the physical, spiritual, and underworld realms together to forge §aSpirit Blocks§f. Shouldn't be too hard for a determined rookie.
ftb.echo.infernal.stage3.task1.not_ready: §bTask§f: Slay the guardian within the §3Inferno Vault§f and gather what you need to craft 12 §2Spirit Blocks§f.
ftb.echo.infernal.stage3.task1.ready: Heh. Looks like you made it back in one piece. Guess you got something special about you after all.
ftb.echo.infernal.stage3.task1.completed: §bTask Completed!§7 You've earned the right to step into the Underworld. Call it the deep, call it hell, call it whatever suits you. Either way, you've proven you can handle it.
ftb.echo.infernal.stage4.task1.lore: That's all I've got for now. Go see what the other §dEchos§f have in store for you, you've earned a breather.
ftb.echo.infernal.stage4.task1.not_ready: §bComplete other §dEchos'§b tasks to unlock more knowledge.
ftb.echo.catalyst.title: §dEcho of The Catalyst
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage3.task1.lore: Hey there. Are you ready to tackle more fun and interesting marvels of technology? It's kind of crazy, right? How so many of us managed to build all these §3Upgrades§f for the same ancient machine across different eras, each one improving on the last. Not to brag, but I've contributed more §3Upgrades§f to the §6World Engine§f than most. Still, quality beats quantity every time. My work ended up at §3Tier 3§f for a reason. Wait until you see what some of the other §dEchos§f cooked up, it'll blow your mind. Anyway, enough yapping, let's get to it.
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage3.task1.lore2: The §3Upgrade§f I'll be teaching you about is what keeps the whole §6World Engine§f from falling apart when you start cranking up the power. My §2Advanced Machine Blocks§f are the backbone of every higher-tier system. Without them, you'd probably collapse this entire dimension. So before we risk that, let's work on your power generation.
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage3.task1.lore3: With the help of some tech from §dThe Quartermaster§f and §dThe Infernal§f, you'll need to build an §aEnergizing Orb§f. It's used to fuse high-energy materials like §cNitro Crystals§f. Once you get that running, use the results to make a §cNitro Ender Cell§f and power up your §6World Engine§f.
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage3.task1.ready: Nice, you picked that up fast. Let's kick things up a notch.
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage3.task1.completed: §bTask Completed!§7 This Upgrade gives your World Engine way better control over energy flow. You're now one step closer to building some seriously advanced automation.
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage3.task2.lore: So... You've heard of dragons, right? Those mythical, regal, flying creatures with scales harder than diamonds? Well, the §6W.E.R.K§f says they don't exist in your world, but somewhere out there, their eggs do. And, of course, they're locked inside another §3Vault§f. Because nothing good ever comes easy, right?
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage3.task2.lore2: No clue what you'll run into down there, maybe even a dragon itself. What I do know is that you'll need a §dDragon Egg§f to craft §2Enderium§f for my next §3Upgrade§f. Best of luck!
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage3.task2.lore3: §7§oTip: Automate dragon egg production with XyCraft Extractors or another reliable method before turning them into Enderium.
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage3.task2.ready: Awesome work. We're getting close now, I promise.
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage3.task2.completed: §bTask Completed!§7 You're ready to craft the core components for the §2Advanced Machine Blocks§f.
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage3.task3.lore: You will notice that §6W.E.R.K§f has given you some extra tasks inside your questbook. Each will require you to expand your knowledge even further along a specific technical field.
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage3.task3.lore2: Along with the §2Enderium§f, you'll need tougher machine frames, empowered minerals, and more advanced circuitry. Once you master that, you'll be able to craft the §2Advanced Machine Blocks§f that allow you to push your §6World Engine§f to the next level.
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage3.task3.ready: Congrats! That was quite a lot of work, but I promise it'll be worth it.
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage3.task3.completed: §bTask Completed!§7 Your §6World Engine§f is tougher and more stable than ever, ready to handle the next wave of upgrades.
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage4.task1.lore: That's it from me for now. Go check in with the other §dEchos§f, maybe they've cooked up something fun.
ftb.echo.catalyst.stage4.task1.not_ready: §bComplete other §dEchos'§b tasks to unlock more knowledge.
ftb.echo.twilight.title: §dEcho of Twilight
ftb.echo.twilight.stage4.task1.lore: Look, brother, another would-be savior of mankind. How pitiful, and yet how predictable. So this is the one the §6W.E.R.K§f chose to send to their doom. Unlike you mortals, my brother and I were born of an ancient and forgotten people. I have watched the ages pass since the fall of twilight, stories older than time itself. If you are foolish enough to seek death, then by all means, challenge the §3Vaults§f none have conquered.
ftb.echo.twilight.stage4.task1.lore2: Your world contains §3Vaults§f translocated by the §6W.E.R.K§f in a futile, desperate attempt to hold back the end of yet another dimension. Within them dwell the remnants of my homeland; beings of immense power and wrath. To strengthen your §6World Engine§f, you will need their heads as trophies, each one bound with an aspect of ancient magic.
ftb.echo.twilight.stage4.task1.lore3: Begin with the §aLich§f, master of illusions and the undead. Then seek the frozen caverns where an §2Ancient Yeti§f roams, its strength forged in frost and rage. Next, you must face the rulers of flame and ice, the §bIce-Clad Queen§f and the §cThree-Headed Hydra§f. Finally, confront the legion of §dUndead Knights§f who guard the last bastion of the §dTwilight§f realm.
ftb.echo.twilight.stage4.task1.lore4: Bring me their heads, mortal, and perhaps you will prove that your kind has not become completely incompetent.
ftb.echo.twilight.stage4.task1.not_ready: §bTask§f: Claim all 5 §2Twilight Trophies§f from the §3Vaults§f within the §dTwilight Ring§f.
ftb.echo.twilight.stage4.task1.ready: So you have survived after all. It seems the §6W.E.R.K§f did not choose as poorly as it often does.
ftb.echo.twilight.stage4.task1.completed: §bTask Completed!§7 With these trophies, your §6World Engine§f now resonates with the power of the §dTwilight Realm§f. May the Keeper's fortune follow you.
ftb.echo.twilight.stage5.task1.lore: That will suffice. Seek the other §dEchos§f and continue your futile struggle, human.
ftb.echo.twilight.stage5.task1.not_ready: §bComplete other §dEchos'§b tasks to unlock more knowledge.
ftb.echo.ancient.title: §dEcho of The Ancient
ftb.echo.ancient.stage4.task1.lore: Welcome, mortal, to your resting place. Not within this archive, precisely, but likely within the §3Vault§f you must conquer if you wish to obtain the §3Ancient Upgrade§f for your §6World Engine§f. Pay no heed to my sister, §dTwilight§f. She has held onto her pride a little too tightly, even as an §dEcho§f of the §6W.E.R.K§f. Still, I cannot deny I share some of her doubts about your ability to restore the §6World Engine§f.
ftb.echo.ancient.stage4.task1.lore2: No matter. As you have likely realized, despite the fragments of who we once were, we remain bound by our programming. We act as the §6W.E.R.K§f commands, regardless of our own feelings or fears.
ftb.echo.ancient.stage4.task1.lore3: Your §3Upgrade§f lies within a §3Vault§f so ancient that moving it between realms would cause its collapse. The only path to it is through a portal within the Ancient Deep. Perhaps §dThe Infernal§f or §dThe Enchanter§f have already spoken of this place, each in their own way. Whatever they called it, you must be ready to fight for your survival.
ftb.echo.ancient.stage4.task1.lore4: Defeat the horrors within and you will uncover an alloy known as §bCursium§f. With precision and care, it can be molded into §aEuphonium§f, essential for advancing your §6World Engine§f.
ftb.echo.ancient.stage4.task1.not_ready: §bTask§f: Craft 16 §2Euphonium Blocks§f using materials from the §3Vault§f.
ftb.echo.ancient.stage4.task1.ready: You made it back alive. Impressive. Perhaps there is still hope for your kind after all.
ftb.echo.ancient.stage4.task1.completed: §bTask Completed!§7 You now wield the tempered strength of the Deep within your World Engine. Use it wisely, mortal, and may fortune walk beside you.
ftb.echo.ancient.stage5.task1.lore: That is all I can offer you for now. Seek the other §dEchos§f, they too hold fragments of the path ahead.
ftb.echo.ancient.stage5.task1.not_ready: §bComplete other §dEchos'§b tasks to unlock more knowledge.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.title: §dEcho of The Wyrmwright
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage4.task1.lore: Well, well, well... what do we have here? I gotta say, seeing a human reach such heights of knowledge wasn't something I expected, but I'll take the surprise. If memory serves, the last thing I was doing before all this was looking for my brother, §6§kCHAOS§r§f. You haven't seen him around, have you? People tend to think dragons are nothing but wild, fire-breathing beasts with wings the size of continents. But I'm half-dragon and I turned out pretty normal, right? Anyway, you're here for that §3Upgrade§f, so let's get to work.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage4.task1.lore2: I can provide two §3Upgrades§f for your §6World Engine§f. The first will need some key materials to craft the foundation of draconic technology: an §aEnergy Core§f with four stabilizers, and four §2Crystal Matrix Blocks§f. The Matrix design isn't dragon-tech, of cource. My brother borrowed it from §6§kInfinity§r§f, another §dEcho§f he worked closely with.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage4.task1.not_rea: §bTask§f: Craft 4 §2Energy Core Stabilizers§f and §bCrystal Matrix Blocks§f, and an §dEnergy Core§f.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage4.task1.ready: Not bad at all. Seems humans have learned a thing or two since I was last around.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage4.task1.complet: §bTask Completed!§7 Your World Engine is now filled with draconic energy, ready to forge creations worthy of the skies themselves.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage4.task2.lore: Now, for your second §3Upgrade§f. This one's a little more... volatile. The void is a tricky force to control, even for elder dragons, but a mythical species like the leviathans should contain enough void energy to power your §6World Engine§f. Kill one, and bring its unborn offspring to your §6World Engine§f.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage4.task2.lore2: To forge §2Resonant Void§f, you'll need concentrated sources of void energy and alloys strong enough not only to contain that power, but to channel it through your §6World Engine§f as a stable, usable force.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage4.task2.ready: Color me surprised! That should've been impossible for most humans. Glad to see you're not like the rest, my friend.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage4.task2.complet: §bTask Completed!§7 The World Engine now channels both void and draconic power. That's a combination even the elders would've admired.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage5.task1.lore: That's all I've got for now. Go talk to those two other old grumps and see what they've been up to.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage5.task1.not_rea: §bComplete other §dEchos'§b tasks to unlock more knowledge.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage5.task1.ready: Looks like you'll be helping me find my brother after all, my human friend.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage5.task1.complet: §fIf even the §6W.E.R.K§f can't locate my brother, then something is deeply wrong. Let's get to finding those §6Ascended Echos§f.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage5.task2.lore: One thing about dragons is that we can sense our kin across time and space. Wherever my brother is, I know he'll hear me. He always does. He's a chaotic little wyrmling, though, so don't expect him to be somewhere easy to get to. Normally, I'd take you there myself, but you already know I'm just a binary recollection of my memories. Still, there's always hope.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage5.task2.lore2: To get there, you'll need to fuse an awakened draconic alloy with fortron, chronon, and source, then temper it in sheol fire. With luck, the process will carry my race's draconic will into a component strong enough to open a path to him.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage5.task2.ready: Beautiful work. If my brother can hear me, he'll know I've kept my promise. Give him my farewell when you find him.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage5.task2.complet: §bTask Completed!§7 This Chronon Battery can now open a gateway to the Fractured Void. The end of your journey draws near, my friend.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage6.task1.lore: That's really it for me this time. Go meet with the §6Ascended Echos§f and finish what we started.
ftb.echo.wyrmwright.stage6.task1.not_rea: §bComplete other §dEchos'§b tasks to unlock more knowledge.
ftb.echo.radiance.title: §6Echo of Radiance
ftb.echo.radiance.stage5.task1.lore: Astonishing. I did not expect a human to withstand the collapse of the void. That alone confirms you were chosen. Furthermore, the draconic device in your possession tells me the §6W.E.R.K§f has selected you, which means your purpose aligns with ours, though your lifespan remains far more limited.
ftb.echo.radiance.stage5.task1.lore2: My tasks will not be simple. While your §6World Engine§f already channels a considerable amount of void energy, no §dEcho§f has studied the void as intimately as I have. My §3Upgrade§f will allow you to fully infuse its unrestrained power into your §6World Engine§f. Prolonged exposure to the void's event horizon has enabled me to replicate its properties under controlled conditions.
ftb.echo.radiance.stage5.task1.lore3: You must first create a §dBlack Hole§f by accelerating particles with enough force to compress neutrons into a solid state. Using these §aNeutron Piles§f, you can convert Nuclear Waste into a substance that, when supplied with an immense amount of energy, transforms into fluid Antimatter. When solidified §dAntimatter§f and Red Matter collide under sufficient force, a miniature §dBlack Hole§f will form.
ftb.echo.radiance.stage5.task1.lore4: Finally, you must contain the §dBlack Hole§f within a vessel made with an §6Awakened Draconic Alloy§f, the only material capable of enduring such raw power. You will also need a solidified Dark Matter base to stabilize it within the §6World Engine§f. Once you return, I will speak with the others to determine the optimal position for its integration into your §6World Engine§f.
ftb.echo.radiance.stage5.task1.not_ready: §bTask§f: Craft a §dVoid Container§f and a §7Dark Matter Block§f.
ftb.echo.radiance.stage5.task1.ready: You continue to exceed my calculations. Perhaps humanity was not as limited as we once believed. Perhaps if we'd given more of your kind a chance...
ftb.echo.radiance.stage5.task1.completed: §bTask Completed!§7 Your World Engine now manipulates void matter with perfect precision. You are closer than ever to stabilizing your realm, human. How remarkable!
ftb.echo.radiance.stage6.task1.lore: You have learned well. §6Infinity§f will be waiting for you after you have completed §6Chaos'§f tasks.
ftb.echo.radiance.stage6.task1.not_ready: §bComplete other §dEchos'§b tasks to unlock more knowledge.
ftb.echo.chaos.title: §6Echo of Chaos
ftb.echo.chaos.stage5.task1.lore: A human? Here? Impossible. You should've been torn apart the moment you entered the void. And yet... that power you carry... My sister's will. So she found a way to reach me after all, despite all my warnings. Always defiant, always refusing to listen to me just because I was the younger one. Typical of her... and, since you've made it here, I'll trust in her faith in you.
ftb.echo.chaos.stage5.task1.lore2: We've been holding this realm together for what feels like forever. Time doesn't flow right here; it stretches endlessly, twisting around the event horizon. Every second, the void pushes harder, and every second, we push back. I don't know how much longer we can hold it. Or how much of our knowledge the §6W.E.R.K§f will even retain when this all eventually ends.
ftb.echo.chaos.stage5.task1.lore3: Listen closely. The §dAwakened Draconic Core§f must be restored if you wish to upgrade your §6World Engine§f. It was the most ingenious invention of our species: a capacitor capable of storing infinite amounts of energy. You will to combine several hundred individual alloys into blocks before can assemble it. Once that's done, you return to me. If you need my help, I'll assemble it myself. We must do whatever it takes to stop this collapse.
ftb.echo.chaos.stage5.task1.not_ready: §bTask§f: Craft the components needed for a §6Tier 8 Draconic Energy Core§f.
ftb.echo.chaos.stage5.task1.ready: Time is collapsing in on itself, human. Move quickly, before the void consumes all.
ftb.echo.chaos.stage5.task1.completed: §bTask Completed!§7 The heart of draconic power beats once more. Complete the assembly through your questbook or by interacting with your energy core.
ftb.echo.chaos.stage6.task1.lore: That's all I can give you. §6Infinity§f will be waiting, once you've completed §6Radiance's§f tasks.
ftb.echo.chaos.stage6.task1.not_ready: §bComplete other §6Echos'§b tasks to unlock more knowledge.
ftb.echo.infinity.title: §6Echo of Infinity
ftb.echo.infinity.intro: A living, breathing human within the void... how curious.
ftb.echo.infinity.stage0.not_ready:
Knowledgeable though you may be, you are not yet prepared to face that which has no end.

Return once you have completed the §6Chaos§f and §6Radiance§f §3World Engine Upgrades§f.
ftb.echo.infinity.stage0.ready: You have arrived at the threshold of Infinity. Beyond this point lies understanding few minds could ever endure.
ftb.echo.infinity.stage0.completed: §7It is time to draw upon all that you have learned, human. In this reality, Infinity cannot be understood, only attained.
ftb.echo.infinity.stage5.task1.lore: You have heard whispers of infinity from the §dEchos§f, but they grasp only fragments. The §6W.E.R.K's§f simulations can imitate knowledge, yet they cannot comprehend the truth behind it. Infinity is both the beginning and the end, creation and collapse intertwined.
ftb.echo.infinity.stage5.task1.lore2: Do not fear what you cannot fully grasp. You need not understand Infinity to wield its power. You need only follow the path I will reveal, for I have walked it countless times.
ftb.echo.infinity.stage5.task1.lore3: Begin by compressing matter into distinct singularities, each embodying a separate aspect. Your §6World Engine§f will then combine them into a single §aInfinity Singularity§f, the catalyst for creation itself. From it, you may forge the §6Infinity Ingot§f, an alloy that contains the very essence of being.
ftb.echo.infinity.stage5.task1.lore4: Once you have gathered nine of these alloys, shape them into a block, and place it alongside two §aReactor Neutron Reflectors§f to shield your §6World Engine§f from collapse. Only then will you unlock the final §3World Engine Upgrade§f.
ftb.echo.infinity.stage5.task1.not_ready: §bTask§f: Craft an §6Infinity Block§f and 2 §aReactor Neutron Reflectors§f.
ftb.echo.infinity.stage5.task1.ready: You now hold the spark of creation itself. Use it wisely.
ftb.echo.infinity.stage5.task1.completed: §bTask Completed!§7 Your World Engine now mirrors Infinity, capable of both creation and renewal. The W.E.R.K summons you once more.
ftb.echo.infinity.stage6.task1.lore: You have achieved what no human before you has accomplished. The §6World Engine§f is whole once more, and through it, your reality endures.
ftb.echo.infinity.stage6.task1.not_ready: §bComplete other §dEchos'§b tasks to unlock more knowledge.
